title: Ito Junji Kenkyuu: Horror no Shinen kara
original_name: 伊藤潤二研究 ホラーの深淵から
sinopse:
A book celebrating Junji Ito's 30th anniversary. Includes interviews, articles, color illustrations and the following chapters:

1. Kyoufu no Juusou
2. Yon & Muu no Yuurei Bukken
3. Kubitsuri Kikyuu Sairai
4. Masei
